title: Spain Private Debt to GDP
description: Private Debt to GDP in Spain decreased to 206.30 percent in 2021 from 213.40 percent in 2020. Private Debt to GDP in Spain averaged 211.65 percent from 1995 until 2021, reaching an all time high of 276.10 percent in 2007 and a record low of 128.90 percent in 1995. Private sector debt to GDP measures the indebtedness of both sectors, non-financial corporations and households and non-profit institutions serving households, as a percentage of GDP.
author: OECD
